Build: 4-26 0100 Release

When I close the workbench after my smoke test (ejb project creation, deploy, 
import/export) I get this: (and others, but as I understand it, they're known)

I've tried to recreate the error, but have not yet been able to determine 
exactly what I must do before shutdown to cause it.  I've only been able to get 
it reliably by doing the entire smoke test.

Does the build number "4-26 0100" refer to a WSAD build? Which Eclipse build is 
this (i.e. M5?).

This must refer to the M5 build. Looking at the code, it means we have a launch 
history item that does not have an associated launch configuration.
4-26 0100 refers to build 20020426_0100-M5-V50R.  Sorry for the confusion.

I encountered this defect just moments ago.
I am using a patched M5 build.
Provided a patch for testing (org.eclipse.debug.ui version vM5-20020503)

Additional information: I have seen the following (apparently related) NPE on 
startup (either because of the reported defect or causing the reported defect)

yes, when writing the history fails, reading will fail too. We have fixed the 
writing problem. The reading problem should go away after one workspace re-
start.
*** Bug 15842 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Fixed in 2.0 HEAD stream. As well, patch was in latest M5 build.

verified in 20020516_0100-M5-V50R build of WSAD
